definitions.definition: A person following the pursuits of civil life, especially one who is not an active member of the armed forces.
definitions.example: Three civilians were apprehended by the soldiers and taken away in a military vehicle.

definitions.definition: A person who does not belong to a particular group or engage in a particular activity.
definitions.example: The bathroom was for employees only, so no civilians were allowed to use it.

definitions.definition: A student of civil law at a university or college.
Not related to the military, police or other professions.
definitions.example: He worked as a civilian journalist for ten years before being employed by the public broadcaster.
